bill.title: Relating To Collective Bargaining.
bill.description: Expands the types of employee information government agencies are required to disclose, upon written request, to employees' exclusive representatives. Requires that information regarding new hire employees be provided to the appropriate exclusive representatives within one payroll period. (SB1143 HD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to LCA, JDC/WAM.
The committee(s) on LCA has scheduled a public hearing on 02-07-19 2:45PM in conference room 224.

The committee(s) on LCA recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in LCA were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, Ihara, S. Chang; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard, Fevella.
Reported from LCA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 331) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to JDC/WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDC/WAM.
The committee(s) on JDC/WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-26-19 10:00AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in JDC were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) K. Rhoads, Wakai, Gabbard, Kim; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Fevella ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WAM were as follows: 9 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, English, Harimoto, Kanuha, Kidani, Moriwaki, Shimabukuro, Taniguchi; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Fevella ; 0 No(es): none; and 4 Excused: Senator(s) Keith-Agaran, Inouye, K. Kahele, Riviere.
Reported from JDC/WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 921) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
One Day Notice 03-05-19.
Report Adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none. Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Harimoto). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 374) in amended form (SD 1).
Pass First Reading
Referred to LAB, FIN, referral sheet 27
Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB on Thursday, 03-14-19 9:00AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Johanson, Eli, Ichiyama, Kitagawa, McKelvey, Yamashita, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Quinlan.
Reported from LAB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1548) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Belatti, Cabanilla Arakawa, Holt, Tokioka, Yamane excused (5).
Carried over to 2020 Regular Session.

votes.desc: Senate Labor, Culture and the Arts: Passed, With Amendments
Senate Ways and Means: Passed, Unamended
House Labor & Public Employment: Passed, With Amendments
